definitions.text: a strong very dark heavy-bodied ale made from pale malt and roasted unmalted barley and (often) caramel malt with hops
a garment size for a large or heavy person

examples: a stalwart supporter of the UN
men are portly and women are stout

definitions.text: having rugged physical strength; inured to fatigue or hardships
examples: proud of her tall stalwart son
